ygData.subject: Re: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: I am sorry let me say this again i meant the  MIDNIGHT MALLET and if so how do i go about getting it? also a few more things i have questiins for there are a
ygData.messageBody:
I am sorry let me say this again i meant the MIDNIGHT MALLET

and if so how do i go about getting it?
also a few more things i have questiins for

there are a few items that are supossed to be in west karana

glowing bone collar ac5 plus 25 hp 25 plus mana
bone armplates ac5 plus 5 stenght -4 dex
chipped bone braclet ac4 wisdom plus 5

as far as i can see any class any size can use it...it is very low in weight
but where in west karana do i get it on what kinda monster and what level..


thankyou for your time Ventura (rallos)
----- Original Message -----
From: robert nunez <homenunez@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, July 03, 1999 10:39 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Quest Help(riverdale)


> From: "robert nunez" <homenunez@...>
>
> well i have a question i want to know about this midnight hammer does
anyone
> out there know anything about it
>
>
>
> and oh yah i killed trumpy and got the hammer mannnn it took me such a
long
> time to get it,,,,travel time kinda sucked but it was worth the trip
> ----- Original Message -----

> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Quest Help(riverdale)

> > >

> > towns.
